docs.snippet: The Knicks’ Andrea Bargnani has been sidelined indefinitely with an elbow injury, and Coach Mike Woodson suggested that the news media is manufacturing controversy....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ Andrea Bargnani has been sidelined indefinitely with an elbow injury, and Coach Mike Woodson suggested that the news media is manufacturing controversy.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks reveal that forward Andrea Bargnani has been sidelined indefinitely with an elbow injury; video of the injury goes viral, seeming to typify everything that has gone wrong for the Knicks this season.

headline.main: Bargnani’s Injury Adds to Knicks’ Frustration
headline.print_headline: Bargnani’s Injury Adds to Knicks’ Frustration

docs.snippet: Joel Embiid bends slightly to get through the doorway, and then bends even deeper to peer into the refrigerator. He pushes aside chilled bottles of Coca-Cola and Fanta and then, upon getting to the very back of the cooler, lets his massive shoulde...
docs.lead_paragraph: Joel Embiid bends slightly to get through the doorway, and then bends even deeper to peer into the refrigerator. He pushes aside chilled bottles of Coca-Cola and Fanta and then, upon getting to the very back of the cooler, lets his massive shoulders slump one last time.

headline.main: Kansas Star Joel Embiid on Way to NBA?
headline.print_headline: Kansas Star Joel Embiid on Way to NBA?

docs.snippet: Even at the Olympics, with world recognition at stake, curling largely relies on athletes to police themselves and call their own fouls....
docs.lead_paragraph: Even at the Olympics, with world recognition at stake, curling largely relies on athletes to police themselves and call their own fouls.
docs.abstract: Curling largely relies on athletes to police themselves and call their own fouls, even at the Olympics, with world recognition at stake; historically seen as a gentleman’s game, curlers are expected to call attention to their own errors; while some officials line curling arenas, they are chiefly relegated to timekeeping and measuring.

headline.main: A Code of Honor, Not a Referee, Keeps Curlers Honest
headline.print_headline: Code of Honor, Not a Referee, Governs Curlers

docs.snippet: The first question everyone asked after my nephew was killed after being struck by a car was whether the driver was drunk. Yet merely looking for alcohol or drug involvement by the driver misses the point....
docs.abstract: The first question everyone asked after my nephew was killed after being struck by a car was whether the driver was drunk. Yet merely looking for alcohol or drug involvement by the driver misses the point.

headline.main: Treat Reckless Driving Like Drunk Driving
